segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a big mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar, which is disgustingly careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to lose his balance any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, not caring about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's disgusting how no one is paying attention to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the disgusting mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself, but he's being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one seems to care about the mess it's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will help him if he starts to fall, but she seems just as careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress is getting wet, but she doesn't even notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just full of unnoticed dangers and disgusting carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
